text: Clivipollia pulchra is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Pisaniidae ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea. ==References== * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp. ==External links== * Category:Pisaniidae Category:Gastropods described in 1846
title: Clivipollia pulchra
